item.description:
Forks over Knives, "a film that can save your life", at private home in Harvard Square, Cambridge

To RSVP, confirm here AND as a safety vetting process for the host/homeowner AND to give you the actual address of the event; send your name and phone number for verification to Maynard.Clark@GMail.com. 

If you wish to chip in 50 cents or a dollar to help with cost of snacks, that is nice. Otherwise do bring your own RAW VEGAN snacks (no honey - this event is a repost from Boston Vegan Meetup Group, so please be respectful) - and something to share would be nice, also. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: Send your name and phone number for verification to Maynard.Clark@GMail.com.
item.name: Forks Over Knives
